ERROR TIPS

### Entity Placement Errors
- Check for existing entities before placing new ones in a location
- Ensure target location is clear of items and other entities before placement
- Verify inventory contains required item before attempting to place

### Connection and Orientation Issues
- Steam engines require specific orientation to function properly
- When connecting fluid entities (pump-boiler-engine), ensure proper pipe connections and orientation
- Clean up existing pipes before attempting new connections to avoid conflicts

### Resource Management
- Monitor and maintain fuel levels in all machines (mining drills, boilers, furnaces)
- Keep track of raw material inventory (coal, ore) to maintain continuous production
- Ensure sufficient materials before starting crafting operations

### Power System Setup
- Steam engine must be properly oriented and connected to work
- Maintain continuous fuel supply in boiler
- Ensure complete connection chain from pump through boiler to steam engine

### Machine Operation
- Verify machine status (WORKING, NO_FUEL, NOT_CONNECTED) to diagnose issues
- Keep machines fueled to maintain continuous operation
- Monitor science pack levels in labs to maintain research progress

### Inventory Management
- Check for required items before attempting to craft or place
- Maintain sufficient basic resources (coal, wood, stone) for crafting and fueling
- Keep track of intermediate products needed for science pack production
